commit.message:
ira-color.c (update_curr_costs): Free updated hard reg costs.

	* ira-color.c (update_curr_costs): Free updated hard reg costs.
	(ira_reassign_conflict_allocnos): Remove bogus asserts.
	(allocno_reload_assign): Likewise.
